physical_examinations.vital_signs: Normal vital signs; weight was 62.4 kg (10 kg less than 1 month earlier)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Abdomen was soft, with epigastric and left upper quadrant tenderness without rebound. The patient appeared anxious and sad, was intermittently tearful, with frequent hand-wringing and restating of a belief that she had cancer. Routine laboratory studies were normal.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient had a significant weight loss of 4.5 kg over the previous 3 weeks, and her anxiety and obsession with the belief of having cancer increased.
